Package Model

Class ServerModelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.ServerModelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerModel, utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>, utility.observer.subject.LocalSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
    public class ServerModelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerModel
    Server side model manager class that implements the ServerModel interface and accesses the database.
    Version:
    3.0 - 01.06.21
    Author:
    Group 1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ServerModelManager()
      Zero argument constructor initializing the database data access object singleton and using it to populate the user list, search items list, forum, faq's and articles.

      • againReported

        public boolean againReported​(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String report)
        Boolean checking whether a username is already on a user's report list.
        Specified by:
        againReported in interface ServerModel
        Parameters:
        username - String to search for in the user list and get their list of reports
        report - String of the username to check if it's already on the user's report list
        Returns:
        'true' if the user with this username has already reported the user with the second String as a username, otherwise returns 'false'

        listener - the listener to be added
        propertyNames - a var-args list of property names. If empty, then the listener should be added as a lister for all events.
        Returns:
